## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/addressesmap">AddressesMap</a> represents information about valid addresses used by debug information.

Valid addresses are those which points to live code sections. i.e. relocations for these addresses point into sections which would be/are placed into resulting binary.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/addressesmap-h">AddressesMap.h</a>.

### getExprOpAddressRelocAdjustment() {#ad3747d64ebd2ed13c010cfc3a5a1bc42}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual std::optional&lt; int64&#95;t &gt; llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::AddressesMap::getExprOpAddressRelocAdjustment (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> &amp; U, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression/operation">DWARFExpression::Operation</a> &amp; Op, uint64&#95;t StartOffset, uint64&#95;t EndOffset, bool Verbose)</>}>
Checks that the specified DWARF expression operand <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a></code> references live code section and returns the relocation adjustment value (to get the linked address this value might be added to the source expression operand address).

Print debug output if <code>Verbose</code> is true. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
relocation adjustment value or std::nullopt if there is no corresponding live address.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/addressesmap-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/addressesmap-h">AddressesMap.h</a>.

### getSubprogramRelocAdjustment() {#af8507c66ef225e656610e1d516b0abbd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual std::optional&lt; int64&#95;t &gt; llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::AddressesMap::getSubprogramRelocAdjustment (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdie">DWARFDie</a> &amp; DIE, bool Verbose)</>}>
Checks that the specified subprogram <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a></code> references the live code section and returns the relocation adjustment value (to get the linked address this value might be added to the source subprogram address).

Allowed kinds of input <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>: DW&#95;TAG&#95;subprogram, DW&#95;TAG&#95;label. Print debug output if <code>Verbose</code> is true. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
relocation adjustment value or std::nullopt if there is no corresponding live address.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/addressesmap-h/#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/addressesmap-h">AddressesMap.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getVariableRelocAdjustment() {#af518b8bb3f9740abb54f9aadf86d7344}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; bool, std::optional&lt; int64&#95;t &gt; &gt; llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::AddressesMap::getVariableRelocAdjustment (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdie">DWARFDie</a> &amp; DIE, bool Verbose)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This function checks whether variable has DWARF expression containing operation referencing live address(f.e.

DW&#95;OP&#95;addr, DW&#95;OP&#95;addrx...). 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
first is true if the expression has an operation referencing an address. second is the relocation adjustment value if the live address is referenced.
</SectionUser>
